name: MEC Rixen & Kaul World Tour/Division Upper Rail
categories: Rixen& Kaul World Tour/Division Upper Rail
description: Replacement upper rail for MEC panniers that use the Rixen and Kaul attachment system, including 2015 or newer World Tour panniers, Division panniers, and 2015 or newer Aquanot panniers.Horizontally adjustable spring-loaded hooks fit racks with diameters between 8 and 16mm.Easy quick-release system detaches from rack in just one click.Sturdy eyelets let you clip on a shoulder strap (sold separately).
